column4: hi, I installed ubuntu via wubi, and my harddisk has 2 partition, labeled [Data] and [System], but only [System] appearing in [Computer] window, how to display the [Data] partition also?
have you mounted the data partition?
although I havent mount it, the System one appears, not the Data one,
it may have just guessed as far as the System one. Try "sudo fdisk -l"
